# NetworkPlayerBody.SetCrouchingLevel method

Set the shape height by a given process value

```csharp
public virtual void SetCrouchingLevel(float crouchInProcess)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| crouchInProcess | can be between 0 (crouching) and 1 (non crouching) |
